    • GenericButtonFront

      public GenericButtonFront(String name, int id, int x, int y, int width, int height, String text, Font font, Action action)
      Create a generic functional button. addIntent needs to be used to add a purpose other than hovering to this button.
      Parameters:
      name - : Name of the entity
      id - : Id of the entity
      x - : x position by design
      y - : y position by design
      width - : design width
      height - : design height
      text - : text to display (Centered) at the button
      font - : Font to use for this button
